channel.title: Texas on Tobyblog
channel.description: Recent content in Texas on Tobyblog

item.title: Road Trip Travel Log 01.02
item.description: Picture of me in the Llano Estacado, Texas’s “wine country”. On the road for quite a while and still not out of the state. Holding up well. Fear the little one may be coming down with a cold. Hope he’s better after some rest. Changed restaurant plans and will revisit our old favorite in Albuquerque for the third year in a row. The food there has always been great, though the service is consistently slow.

item.title: Road Trip Travel Log 01.01
item.description: We’re well in to the big family road trip of 2019, and the obligatory Texas pit stop at Bucc-ees has been checked off the list. Would have sent you guys a pic from the storied Bucc-ees bathrooms, but I was too excited about these new hot n’ spicy Beaver Nuggets! You can hear all about my first experience with those glorified Corn Pops in this review I did last year with my good buddy Brian.
